::: Set waits until the shields fluxuate, and then dashes through. The rod 
provided a brief bend in the shield matrix, which allowed him through. :::

::: Set, being on the inside of the shileds, heads for the ramp to get inside 
so he can bring down the shields. Hopefully, the Maximals wont detect him. 
::: 

::: Ominous and Ra continue to target annoying Auto-guns. :::
